main_topic.author: VolodymyrBilyachat
main_topic.title: Now I am confused. Pelican is the thing or a place?
main_topic.content: Its my first competition but probably most confusing. I thought that categories are things or places. But in recent play my agent was answering questions about pelican. And lucky I am that questioner guessed it properly… But again what category is that?

comments.author: torino
comments.content: i think it is animal(thing). you can check it category on replay
comments.date: Posted 11 days ago  ·  49th in this Competition
